text: The Mirage is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:The Mirage 1924 silent film comedy directed by George Archainbaud and starring Florence Vidor.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films:The Mirage ==Cast== *Florence Vidor - Irene Martin *Clive Brook - Henry Galt *Alan Roscoe - Al Manning *Vola Vale - Betty Bond *Myrtle Vane - Mrs. Martin *Charlotte Stevens - Irene's Sister ==References== ==External links== * The Mirage at IMDb.com * Category:1924 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American films Category:Lost American films Category:Films directed by George Archainbaud Category:Producers Distributing Corporation films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American comedy films Category:1924 comedy films Category:1924 lost films Category:Lost comedy films
title: The Mirage (1924 film)
